edu.rit.pj2.vbl

Class BitSet32Vbl.MaxSize

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.pj2.Tuple
      • edu.rit.pj2.vbl.BitSet32Vbl
        • edu.rit.pj2.vbl.BitSet32Vbl.MaxSize
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Streamable, Vbl, java.lang.Cloneable
    Enclosing class:
    BitSet32Vbl

    public static class BitSet32Vbl.MaxSize
extends BitSet32Vbl
    Class BitSet32Vbl.MaxSize provides a reduction variable for a set of integers from 0 to 31, where the reduction operation is to keep the set with the largest size. The set elements are stored in a bitmap representation.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class edu.rit.pj2.vbl.BitSet32Vbl

    • Method Detail

      • reduce

        public void reduce(BitSet32 bitset)
        Reduce the given bitset into this shared variable. This shared variable's bitset field and the bitset argument are combined together using this shared variable's reduction operation, and the result is stored in the bitset field.

        The BitSet32Vbl.MaxSize class's reduce() method changes this variable's bitset field to be a copy of the bitset argument if the latter's size is larger.

        Overrides:
        reduce in class BitSet32Vbl
        Parameters:
        bitset - Bitset.
